QuestData.Title: Lucky Charm
QuestData.Description: My daddy would never admit it, but he's really superstitious. I don't think he'll ever feel safe on a horse unless he has a lucky charm!$b$bI heard about a fox somewhere around here that's been eating a lot of chickens, and escaping everybody trying to catch him. I bet he's really lucky! Maybe if you got his tail and gave it to my dad, he'd feel lucky too!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The luckiest fox in the woods! He's evaded everybody who's tried to catch him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Lucktail's Tail from Lucktail in Rockskip Falls.
QuestData.CompletionText: Tails are real lucky, $n. I think this one will give my dad heaps of courage!
QuestData.RewardText: I think I can feel the luck too!
